publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3337 Fergus Ewing: Inverness Harbourâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Inverness Harbour Trust on its continuing success, as shown in its recent annual report for the year to September 2004; believes that the port is vital to the economic well-being of the city of Inverness; welcomes the expansion plans which have been brought forward by the trustees, as outlined in the annual report, and hopes that the plans will be translated into reality.
S2M-3337 Inverness Harbour (lodged on 22 September 2005) Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3337 Inverness Harbour (lodged on 22 September 2005) Mr John Swinney*, Richard Lochhead*, Jim Mather*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Ms Sandra White*, Mary Scanlon*, Murdo Fraser*
S2M-3337 Inverness Harbour (lodged on 22 September 2005) Dr Jean Turner*, Brian Adam*, Rob Gibson*, John Swinburne*
S2M-3337 Inverness Harbour (lodged on 22 September 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
